title: PyOhio 2011: HTSQL is a WSGI reporting toolkit for Relational Databases
description:
HTSQL is a WSGI reporting toolkit for Relational Databases

Presented by Clark C. Evans

HTSQL is a URI-based high-level query language for relational databases;
it is written in the Python language. HTSQL is a wonderful complement
existing WSGI- based applications, making it trivial to create
interactive dashboards, complex reports. We use HTSQL as a REST query
interface for data integration and ad-hoc reporting by technical users
or ``accidental programmers``.
